name: Combine It! (itch)
description:
Welcome to Combine It! — a rage game intended to fill you with… rage. After civilization has been all but destroyed by meteorite strikes, one survivor emerges from the rubble: you! While meteorites continue to strike, threatening everything you’ve worked for, do your best to build up structures within the time limit.

Warning: This game is incredibly difficult. Not for the feint of heart!

Credits

Game by Worldly Devs Studios

Panos Tsotros (Panos Tsotros / FatDumDuck)
